attributes.action: Give 'Dave the Rave' the freedom of the City (in Sunderland)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Penshaw Monument, The Wear Bridge, Dave the Rave. All icons of Sunderland. Dave the Rave has brought so much to our city, putting smiles on peoples faces and bringing joy to many thousands of people in Sunderland. Let us now give something back. I demand Dave the Rave be given the key to our wonderful city, as well as our hearts.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
